# Date Range Picker

![Date Range Picker](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/50990639/425995857-ec45190f-ce17-43ae-b8a0-bd8b198a5fef.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..pN_9ywO8nTFO8xp6tSRZJ7VnYafi1vL8Zg2H9YlDlkI)


A beautiful, accessible date range picker component built with shadcn/ui. This component provides an intuitive interface for selecting date ranges with advanced features like month/year dropdowns, preset ranges, and comparison functionality.

## Features

- üìÖ **Month & Year Dropdowns** - Quickly navigate to specific months and years
- üîç **Preset Date Ranges** - One-click selection of common ranges (Last 7 Days, Last 30 Days, etc.)
- üìä **Multi-Month View** - See two months side-by-side for easier date range selection
- üìà **Date Range Comparison** - Compare two different date ranges side by side
- üì± **Responsive Design** - Works beautifully on mobile, tablet, and desktop
- ‚ôø **Keyboard Navigation** - Full keyboard support for accessibility
- üé® **Customizable Styling** - Easily adapt to your design system
